entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:14 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 10:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -37.2°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.0°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
